pages.text: 69|35|ata'eba, e dina tara kono suhrda thakabe na
69|36|ara kono khadya thakabe na ksata nihsrta sraba chara
69|37|ya aparadhi chara ke'u khabe na.
69|38|Ata'eba, ami kasama karachi tara, ya tomara dekhate pa'o
69|39|ebam ya tomara dekhate pa'ona tara'o
69|40|niscaya e kura'ana eka sam'manita rasulera (bahita) bani [1].
69|41|Ara eta kono kabira katha naya; tomara khuba alpa'i imana posana kare thaka
69|42|eta kono ganakera katha'o naya, tomara alpa'i upadesa grahana kara.
69|43|Eta srstikulera rabera kacha theke nayilakrta.
69|44|Tini yadi amadera name kono katha racana kare calate cesta karatena
69|45|tabe abasya'i amara take pakara'o karatama dana hata diye [1]
69|46|tarapara abasya'i amara kete ditama tara hrdapindera sira
69|47|atahpara tomadera madhye emana ke'u'i ne'i, ye tamke raksa karate pare.
69|48|Ara e kura'ana muttakidera jan'ya abasya'i eka upadesa.
69|49|Ara amara abasya'i jani ye, tomadera madhye mithya aropakari rayeche.
69|50|Ara e kura'ana niscaya'i kaphiradera anusocanara karana habe
69|51|ara niscaya eta suniscita satya.
69|52|Ata'eba, apani apanara mahana rabera namera pabitrata o mahima ghosana karuna.
70|1|Eka byakti ca'ila, sanghatita hoka sasti ya abadharita [1]
70|2|kaphiradera jan'ya, etake pratirodha karara ke'u ne'i [1].
70|3|Eta asabe allahara kacha theke, yini urdhbarohanera sopanasamuhera adhikari [1].
70|4|Pheresata ebam ruha allahara dike urdhbagami haya [1] emana eka dine, yara parimana pancasa hajara bachara [2].
70|5|Kaje'i apani dhairya dharana karuna parama dhairya.
70|6|Tara ai dinake mane kare sudura
70|7|kintu amara dekhachi ta asanna [1]
70|8|sedina akasa habe galita dhatura mata
70|9|ebam parbatasamuha habe rangina pasamera mata
70|10|ebam suhrda suhrdera khomja nebe na
